author: CBC News
title: Vancouverites stage noisy show of appreciation for health-care workers
description: West End and Yaletown residents are making noise from their balconies each night at 7 p.m. to coincide with St. Paul's Hospital shift change.
content:
The streets may be quieter than usual but residents isolating in Vancouver's Yaletown and West End apartments are getting loud nightly in a public display of appreciation for health-care workers on the front lines of the COVID-19 outbreak.
